meanings.definition: To hit a home run in baseball.
meanings.sent1: Yesterday, he homered during the game.
meanings.sent2: The player homered in the final inning to win the match.
meanings.sent3: The baseball flew so far after he homered that it landed in the neighbor's yard!
meanings.sent4: Her powerful swing homered the ball out of the park.
meanings.sent5: The crowd cheered loudly as he homered, securing the team's victory.

meanings.definition: To achieve a high level of success or accomplishment.
meanings.sent1: She homered in her presentation and impressed everyone.
meanings.sent2: After months of hard work, he finally homered in his career.
meanings.sent3: His idea to use drones for delivery homered with the investors.
